attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: George Martin has a knighthood and he wasn’t even in the Beatles. Tom Jones has a knighthood, for heaven’s sake. The Beatles helped to change the face of modern culture, so surely there should be an insignia in it for the man who kept the beat.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
